name: ACALL Inc.
description: Acall Digital Workplace Solutions fit into all kind of operations such as office reception, access control, and space management through diverse tool integration and flexible customization. Acall supports the automation and analysis of space management, such as the visualization of space utilization rates using check-in data for each spot and the automatic release if any no-show. By creating a "Hybrid Work Platform", we can create an office environment that is safe, secure, and comfortable to work in.
Headline: Life in Work and Work in Life for Happiness
ShortDescription: Acall Digital Workplace Solutions fit into all kind of operations such as office reception, access control, and space management through diverse tool integration and flexible customization.

Highlights.name: Automation of reception and entry and exit
Highlights.description: The iPad reception greatly reduces the service work. You can freely customize the reception menu contents, cooperation services, and screen design, so you can build a reception / entry and exit system that fits your company's operation.

Highlights.name: Check-in management
Highlights.description: You can reserve spaces and seats from any device and tool. You can obtain usage results by check-in/out, and use resources without waste by automatically canceling color reservations and real-time synchronizing usage status.

Highlights.name: ntroduction by taking advantage of existing operations
Highlights.description: It can also be linked with applications such as chat tools and hardware such as extension phones, gates and electronic locks. Acall will also be expanded as the office grows.

enhanced_description: Acall Digital Workplace Solutions offer a comprehensive platform for office reception, access control, and space management, supporting hybrid work environments. The platform automates reception and entry/exit processes with customizable iPad interfaces, significantly reducing manual service work. It provides advanced check-in management, enabling users to reserve spaces and seats from any device, track real-time utilization, and automatically release resources from no-shows, optimizing space usage. Acall also features robust integration capabilities with various tools such as chat applications, extension phones, gates, and electronic locks, designed to be flexible and scalable to support office expansion and ensure a safe, secure, and comfortable working environment.
competitive_advantages: Highly customizable reception menus, services, and screen design
Significant reduction in manual reception service work
Automation of no-show cancellations for efficient space utilization
Real-time synchronization of space usage status
Diverse integration capabilities with existing tools and hardware
Designed for scalability and expansion with growing offices
roi_benefits: Automation of reception and entry/exit processes
Optimized space utilization and resource management
Enhanced employee experience in hybrid work settings
Improved efficiency in resource allocation (e.g., meeting rooms, desks)
Data-driven insights into space usage patterns
scalability_features: Designed to be expanded as the office grows
